Self.Wiki: Determines the configuration for each OS Tuning install or upgrade.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the Product version package.

maxLevel.Wiki: Number of unlocks that this OS tuning option has. 1 is Install, 2 and above are upgrades.

iconId.Wiki: Refers to the icon ID from SB_OsIcon.layout

addVal_lv1.Wiki: The effectiveness string to display for the OS upgrade text in UI.

exp_lv1.Wiki: The cost in OS chips for the upgrade.

textId_lv1.Wiki: The description text that displays the effect. The effect value is placed within this FMG text.

addVal_lv2.Wiki: The effectiveness string to display for the OS upgrade text in UI.

exp_lv2.Wiki: The cost in OS chips for the upgrade.

textId_lv2.Wiki: The description text that displays the effect. The effect value is placed within this FMG text.

addVal_lv3.Wiki: The effectiveness string to display for the OS upgrade text in UI.

exp_lv3.Wiki: The cost in OS chips for the upgrade.

textId_lv3.Wiki: The description text that displays the effect. The effect value is placed within this FMG text.

addVal_lv4.Wiki: The effectiveness string to display for the OS upgrade text in UI.

exp_lv4.Wiki: The cost in OS chips for the upgrade.

textId_lv4.Wiki: The description text that displays the effect. The effect value is placed within this FMG text.

addVal_lv5.Wiki: The effectiveness string to display for the OS upgrade text in UI.

exp_lv5.Wiki: The cost in OS chips for the upgrade.

textId_lv5.Wiki: The description text that displays the effect. The effect value is placed within this FMG text.
